disclaimer.description: You need to reload the desklet for the changes to apply.

inst_id.tooltip: When you got your URL to login, before the first dot you got the ID.

usr.description: Your username for the eKreta system.
usr.tooltip: You need this to fetch data from the eKreta system.

pass.description: Your password for the eKreta system.
pass.tooltip: You need this to fetch data from the eKreta system.

delay_minutes.tooltip: The time to wait till' the next data update. (In minutes).

group_sub_categ.tooltip: Group your average grades by their category. (Doesn't look always good)

show_class_av.tooltip: Show class averages next to your averages.

show_grade_diff.tooltip: Show the difference between your avereages, and your class's averages (You have to turn on class averages).

perfect_grade_value.tooltip: If your grade equals to this, it will be displayed as a perfect grade.

almost_perfect_grade_value.tooltip: If your grade greater or equals to this, it will be displayed as an almost perfect grade.

good_grade_value.tooltip: If your grade greater or equals to this, it will be displayed as a good grade.

middle_grade_value.tooltip: If your grade greater or equals to this, it will be displayed as a middle grade.

bad_grade_value.tooltip: If your grade greater or equals to this, it will be displayed as a bad grade.

really_bad_grade_value.tooltip: If your grade greater or equals to this, it will be displayed as a really bad grade. (Study sometimes...)
